name: The Watch
description: Four men who form a neighborhood watch group as a way to get out of their day-to-day family routines find themselves defending the Earth from an alien invasion.
keywords: female full frontal nudity,female frontal nudity,breasts,female nudity,alien

review.author: g-hbe
review.heading: Entertaining, but aimed at teens.
review.reviewBody: We found this quite entertaining and the characters were good, but I have to ask who wrote the script - a bunch of schoolboys? Almost every gag was based on d*cks, c*m, big red b*lls, condoms and p*ss. Why? There are plenty of other ways of making gags funny, you know.
